import Image from "@theme/IdealImage";
import core from "./core.png";

Welcome to the Arkitekt platform documentation! Arkitekt is a platform and establishing framework for modern bioimage analysis
in all of its glory. It provides ready to use solutions to create and deploy user-friendly bioimage analysis workflows utilizing your bioimage
app ecosystem, exisiting code and infrastructure. Arkitekt follows the mantra of "bring your own tools" and will only interface as
a middleman with you and your tools, managing only the data as well as the flow and orchestration of your analysis. Here are some of
its features:

<Image img={core} />

This documentation should try to give you an overview of all of the features of the platform and how to use them. If you have any
suggestions how to improve this documentation, please feel free to open an issue on our [github](https://github.com/jhnnsrs/doks)

### Build on the Shoulder of Giants

Arkitekt stitches together a plethora of open-source projects and tries to make them accessible, here is just some of them
